timeline.message: Add tool that compares iOS and android strings
First set of corrections to align to iOS
do not ignore the report generated for now
Change the starts with matching to require 2 or more words to match
Align a few more strings.  change literal Log Out to string id
Removing line breaks, adding comments (dev notes)
remove more line breaks, add more comments

timeline.bodyText: Use the string id instead of a literal.
timeline.author: HashEngineering
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,7 +24,7 @@
             android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground"
             android:paddingRight="16dp"
             android:paddingLeft="16dp"
-            android:text="Log Out"
+            android:text="@string/uphold_logout"

timeline.bodyText: When asking the iOS team, it was stated that buttons and titles should be Title case, which means all words are capitalized except for prepositions.  This text doesn't follow that rule.
timeline.author: HashEngineering
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,20 +6,20 @@
     <string name="uphold_buy_dash_with_uphold">Buy Dash with Uphold account</string>
     <string name="uphold_buy_dash_button">Buy Dash</string>
     <string name="uphold_transfer_to_this_wallet_button">Transfer from Uphold</string>
-    <string name="uphold_link_account">Link Uphold account</string>
+    <string name="uphold_link_account">Link Uphold Account</string>
     <string name="uphold_account_dash_balance">Your Uphold account Dash balance is</string>
     <string name="uphold_transfer_to_this_wallet">Transfer Dash from your Uphold account to this wallet</string>
     <string name="uphold_withdrawal_deduct_fee_disclaimer">Fee will be deducted from requested amount.</string>
-    <string name="uphold_withdrawal_instructions">Enter the amount to transfer.</string>
+    <string name="uphold_withdrawal_instructions">Enter the amount to transfer</string>
     <string name="uphold_withdrawal_success_title">Success</string>
     <string name="uphold_withdrawal_success_message">Your transaction was sent and the amount should appear in your wallet in a few minutes.\n\nTransaction id: %s</string>
-    <string name="uphold_otp_dialog_title">Enter your 2FA code below:</string>
+    <string name="uphold_otp_dialog_title">Enter your 2FA code below</string>
     <string name="uphold_transfer">Transfer</string>
     <string name="uphold_see_on_uphold">See on Uphold</string>
-    <string name="uphold_logout_title">Log Out from Uphold</string>
+    <string name="uphold_logout_title">Log out from Uphold</string>

replies.bodyText:
On small and large devices the text still looks the same without the line break in the text.  For example
Scan to
Pay
replies.author: HashEngineering

timeline.bodyText:
The first line is not a question.
Set up is a verp (setup is a noun).
This goes to a screen that the android app doesn't currently use, which would allow the recovery phrase to be used to reset the PIN.  That feature comes later.
timeline.author: HashEngineering
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -67,16 +78,16 @@
     <string name="payments_tab_pay_label">Send</string>
     <string name="payments_tab_receive_label">Receive</string>
     <string name="payments_pay_by_qr_title">Send by</string>
-    <string name="payments_pay_by_qr_sub_title">Scanning QR Code</string>
+    <string name="payments_pay_by_qr_sub_title">Scanning QR code</string>
     <string name="payments_pay_by_qr_button">Scan</string>
     <string name="payments_pay_to_clipboard_title">Send to copied address</string>
     <string name="payments_pay_to_clipboard_sub_title">No address copied</string>
     <string name="payments_pay_to_clipboard_button">Send</string>
 
     <string name="forgot_pin_title">Forgot PIN?</string>
-    <string name="forgot_pin_message">You can set a new PIN with the help of your recovery phrase?</string>
-    <string name="forgot_pin_instruction_1">Enter Recovery Phrase to recover your wallet</string>
-    <string name="forgot_pin_instruction_2">Setup a new PIN</string>
+    <string name="forgot_pin_message">You can set a new PIN with the help of your recovery phrase.</string>
+    <string name="forgot_pin_instruction_1">Enter recovery phrase to recover your wallet</string>
+    <string name="forgot_pin_instruction_2">Set up a new PIN</string>

timeline.bodyText: In case if is not proper grammar which was in the design.  This now matches iOS.
timeline.author: HashEngineering
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -192,18 +205,18 @@
     <string name="verify_it_is_important_subtitle">We are about to show you the secret key to your wallet.</string>
     <string name="verify_info_text_1">This recovery phrase is your access to the funds in this wallet.</string>
     <string name="verify_info_text_2">We do not store this recovery phrase.</string>
-    <string name="verify_info_text_3">In case if this device is lost / damaged, incase if the dash wallet is uninstalled accidentally from this device, you will need this recovery phrase to access your funds.</string>
+    <string name="verify_info_text_3">You will need this recovery phrase to access your funds if this device is lost, damaged or if Dash Wallet ever is accidentally uninstalled from this device.</string>

timeline.bodyText: This is a button and it doesn't use Title case.  Matches iOS.
timeline.author: HashEngineering
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -192,18 +205,18 @@
     <string name="verify_it_is_important_subtitle">We are about to show you the secret key to your wallet.</string>
     <string name="verify_info_text_1">This recovery phrase is your access to the funds in this wallet.</string>
     <string name="verify_info_text_2">We do not store this recovery phrase.</string>
-    <string name="verify_info_text_3">In case if this device is lost / damaged, incase if the dash wallet is uninstalled accidentally from this device, you will need this recovery phrase to access your funds.</string>
+    <string name="verify_info_text_3">You will need this recovery phrase to access your funds if this device is lost, damaged or if Dash Wallet ever is accidentally uninstalled from this device.</string>
     <string name="verify_skip">Skip</string>
-    <string name="verify_secure_now_btn">Secure Now</string>
-    <string name="verify_secure_now_message">If you lose this device, you will lose your funds. Get your UniqueSecretKey so that you can restore your wallet on another device.</string>
-    <string name="verify_seed_title">Please write this down</string>
-    <string name="verify_seed_write_down_confirmation">I have written this down</string>
+    <string name="verify_secure_now_btn">Secure now</string>

timeline.bodyText:
These match iOS.
The designs use the word "this" instead of "it"
Also the designs used passive voice:  "I have written this down" - These match iOS.
timeline.author: HashEngineering
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -192,18 +205,18 @@
     <string name="verify_it_is_important_subtitle">We are about to show you the secret key to your wallet.</string>
     <string name="verify_info_text_1">This recovery phrase is your access to the funds in this wallet.</string>
     <string name="verify_info_text_2">We do not store this recovery phrase.</string>
-    <string name="verify_info_text_3">In case if this device is lost / damaged, incase if the dash wallet is uninstalled accidentally from this device, you will need this recovery phrase to access your funds.</string>
+    <string name="verify_info_text_3">You will need this recovery phrase to access your funds if this device is lost, damaged or if Dash Wallet ever is accidentally uninstalled from this device.</string>
     <string name="verify_skip">Skip</string>
-    <string name="verify_secure_now_btn">Secure Now</string>
-    <string name="verify_secure_now_message">If you lose this device, you will lose your funds. Get your UniqueSecretKey so that you can restore your wallet on another device.</string>
-    <string name="verify_seed_title">Please write this down</string>
-    <string name="verify_seed_write_down_confirmation">I have written this down</string>
+    <string name="verify_secure_now_btn">Secure now</string>
+    <string name="verify_secure_now_message">If you lose this device, you will lose your funds. Get your recovery phrase so that you can restore your wallet on another device.</string>
+    <string name="verify_seed_title">Please write it down</string>
+    <string name="verify_seed_write_down_confirmation">I wrote it down</string>

timeline.message: Make a few more strings the same as iOS
Remove hard coded text from layouts
